description:
A cookie manager on steroids. Which allows to globally delete all or some domain cookies, separated by subdomains and even unknown and on every domain/subdomain on page load/reload/tab and window close.

Cookies can be allowed (permitted) or in particular forced to be deleted by

them.

Auto-flagging can be used for a domain (subdomain based) auto clearing all non permitted cookies, even undiscoverd ones.
name: Flag Cookies
